content: this knit wrap is the perfect accessory for any occasion whether you re attending a formal event or looking to add a touch of comfort and style to your everyday attire the lace edge knit shawl has got you covered designed with simplicity in mind most of the shawl is worked in the cozy rhythm of stockinette stitch immerse yourself in the soothing flow of knitting as you create a soft and comforting fabric but wait there s more the lace panels at the edges bring a delightful touch of challenge taking your knitting skills to the next level and infusing the finished shawl with a magical elegance this pattern is not just about creating a beautiful accessory it s about improving your knitting skills and having a blast along the way trust me every stitch will be an absolute joy allowing you to showcase your newfound expertise with pride get ready to embark on a knitting adventure that combines simplicity and sophistication the lace edge knit shawl is waiting for you to bring it to life **materials ** you will need the following materials to make your shawl -4 skeins approx 876 yards knit picks upcycle alpaca blent worsted weight yarn in pistachio -size 8 5 mm circular knitting needles 32 cord -scissors -2 stitch markers -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends **finished measurements ** this rectangular shawl measures 33 wide x 68 long after blocking **skill level ** intermediate
